author: jochembrouwer
content: Hi all, I am getting myself somehwat acquinted to `execution-spec-tests`. I am wondering it seems that this address: `0xa94f5374fce5edbc8e2a8697c15331677e6ebf0b` is the standard sender address, is this correct?

author: marioevz
content:
Hey ðŸ˜„ yes indeed, at the moment it is, but we have ideas to have this address be dynamically generated depending on the context the test is running, e.g. in the future we want to be able to bundle multiple tests into a single big-blockchain test, that contains multiple senders and smart contracts that test different things in one go, and then we cannot (probably) use a single source account for every test transaction.
So I would not take it as an immutable source of test transactions forever
